description: Fired when a new entity instance is successfully created or reconstructed by the EntityManager. This event signals that a new entity is now tracked and available in the world.

payloadSchema.description: Defines the structure for the 'core:entity_created' event payload.

instanceId.description: The unique instance ID of the created entity.

definitionId.description: The definition ID from which the entity was created.

wasReconstructed.description: True if the entity was reconstructed from save data, false if it was newly created at runtime.

entity.description: The full entity instance that was created.
